import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Footer = () => { return (

This is the official website of Hon Olamijuwonlo Alao-Akala. To discover any latest information or programmes from him, you can keep checking here. Beware of fraudsters.

Follow us: 

Quick Links

Homepage About LMJ Blog Gallery Contact

Contact Us

+234 816 308 7542 info@lamijuakala.com olamijuwonlo@gmail.com Randa, Ogbomoso, Oyo state, Nigeria

Copyright © 2020. All rights reserved.

Made with by{" "} Joshua Oyeleke

); }; export default Footer;
